title: 1979년 Ex Parte Williams 사건

## 사건 정보

**사건명**: Ex Parte Williams

**판사**: Per Curiam

- 375 So. 2d 1271

## 판결문 요약


375 So.2d 1271 (1979)
Ex parte James Ceefers WILLIAMS.
(Re: James Ceefers Williams v. State of Alabama).
No. 79-63.
Supreme Court of Alabama.
November 2, 1979.
PER CURIAM.
Writ denied.
TORBERT, C. J., and BLOODWORTH, FAULKNER, ALMON and EMBRY, JJ., concur.
